pageHeader.title: Free Online Image Cropper
pageHeader.subtitle: Professional Image Cropping Tool with Real-Time Preview
pageHeader.description: Crop, resize, and edit your images with precision. Multiple aspect ratios, advanced controls, and instant downloads. No registration required, completely free to use.

seo.jsonLdDescription: Professional image cropping tool with advanced features including multiple aspect ratios, real-time preview, and high-quality downloads

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.description: Professional image cropping capabilities at your fingertips

aspectRatios.title: Multiple Aspect Ratios
aspectRatios.description: Choose from preset ratios like square (1:1), portrait (3:4), landscape (4:3), wide (16:9), or crop freely without constraints.

realTimePreview.title: Real-Time Preview
realTimePreview.description: See your cropped image instantly as you adjust. Live preview updates with every change for perfect results.

advancedControls.title: Advanced Controls
advancedControls.description: Rotate, flip, zoom, and move your images with precision. 45° and 90° rotation options with fine-grained control.

exportFormats.title: Multiple Export Formats
exportFormats.description: Download in PNG, JPEG, or WebP formats with customizable quality settings for optimal file size.

highResolution.title: High Resolution Support
highResolution.description: Process high-resolution images up to 10MB. Export in full resolution or optimized sizes for web use.

noWatermarks.title: No Watermarks
noWatermarks.description: Completely free with no watermarks, registration, or hidden costs. Your images remain private and secure.

howToUse.title: How to Crop Images
howToUse.description: Simple step-by-step guide to crop your images perfectly

upload.title: Upload & Select Mode
upload.description: Click "Upload Image" and select your photo. Choose from crop modes: Free Crop, Square (1:1), Portrait (3:4), Landscape (4:3), or Wide (16:9). Your image info will be displayed automatically.

adjust.title: Adjust & Fine-tune
adjust.description: Drag the crop area or use Tools & Controls for precise adjustments. Rotate (45°/90°), flip, zoom, move the image. Switch between Crop and Move modes. See real-time preview as you adjust.

export.title: Export & Download
export.description: Choose export format (PNG/JPEG/WebP) and quality settings. Use Quick Download for fast results, Best Quality for full resolution, or Copy to Clipboard. All options preserve your settings.

useCases.title: Common Use Cases
useCases.description: Perfect for various image editing needs

socialMedia.title: Social Media Content
socialMedia.description: Create perfectly sized images for Instagram posts (1:1), Stories (9:16), Facebook covers (16:9), and other social platforms.

profilePictures.title: Profile Pictures & Avatars
profilePictures.description: Crop headshots and photos into perfect square or circular formats for profile pictures across all platforms.

webImages.title: Website & Blog Images
webImages.description: Optimize images for websites, blogs, and online content with specific dimensions and aspect ratios.

printMedia.title: Print & Digital Media
printMedia.description: Prepare images for printing, presentations, and digital media with precise cropping and high-quality output.

photoEditing.title: Photo Editing & Enhancement
photoEditing.description: Remove unwanted areas, focus on subjects, and improve composition by cropping to the perfect frame.

whyCropOnline.title: Why Crop Images Online?
whyCropOnline.description: Benefits of using our professional image cropping tool

noInstallation.title: No Software Installation
noInstallation.description: Works directly in your browser without downloading or installing any software. Compatible with all devices and operating systems.

professionalQuality.title: Professional Quality
professionalQuality.description: Advanced cropping engine with high-quality output, smart resizing algorithms, and multiple export options for professional results.

timeSaving.title: Time Saving
timeSaving.description: Quick and efficient cropping with real-time preview. No learning curve - get perfect results in seconds, not minutes.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Our Image Cropper
whyChooseUs.description: What sets our tool apart from other image editors

advancedFeatures.title: Advanced Features
advancedFeatures.description: Professional-grade controls including precise rotation, flip options, zoom controls, and multiple export qualities - all free.

privacySecurity.title: Privacy & Security
privacySecurity.description: Images are processed locally in your browser. No uploads to servers, no data collection, and complete privacy protection.

mobileOptimized.title: Mobile Optimized
mobileOptimized.description: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on phones, tablets, and desktops. Touch-friendly controls for mobile editing.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Common questions about our image cropping tool

free.question: Is this image cropper completely free?
free.answer: Yes, our image cropping tool is 100% free with no hidden costs, watermarks, or registration requirements. You can crop unlimited images without any restrictions.

formats.question: What image formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support all common image formats including JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, and TIFF. You can export your cropped images in PNG, JPEG, or WebP formats.

fileSize.question: What's the maximum file size I can upload?
fileSize.answer: You can upload images up to 10MB in size. This supports high-resolution photos and most professional image files while ensuring fast processing.

privacy.question: Are my images stored on your servers?
privacy.answer: No, all image processing happens locally in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to our servers, ensuring complete privacy and security.

mobile.question: Can I crop images on mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Absolutely! Our tool is fully optimized for mobile devices with touch-friendly controls. You can crop images on phones and tablets just as easily as on desktop.

quality.question: How do I maintain image quality when cropping?
quality.answer: Use the 'Best Quality' download option for maximum resolution. You can also adjust the quality setting (70-100%) to balance file size and image quality based on your needs.

undo.question: Can I undo changes while cropping?
undo.answer: Yes, you can reset individual adjustments or use the 'Reset All' button to start over. The tool also provides real-time preview so you can see changes before applying them.

aspectRatios.question: What aspect ratios are available?
aspectRatios.answer: We offer common ratios like Square (1:1), Portrait (3:4), Landscape (4:3), Wide (16:9), and Free Crop mode for custom dimensions.
